price: 122.Waxaanu ku siinnay samaan adduunka. Aakhiradana wuxuu hubaal ka mid ahaan inta wanaagsan.
arabic: وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا حَسَنَةٗۖ وَإِنَّهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ لَمِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waātaynāhu fī al-dun'yā ḥasanatan wa-innahu fī al-ākhirati lamina al-ṣāliḥīna
